title: Senior Relationship Manager — CH Onshore
summary: Manage UHNW/HNW Swiss onshore clients in German-speaking Switzerland; strong acquisition and advisory expertise.
description:
## Position Overview
Grow and develop Swiss onshore UHNW/HNW clients across Zurich, Zug, and Schwyz. Provide full-service banking including discretionary/advisory mandates, lending, and wealth planning.

## Key Responsibilities
- Originate and expand client base in German-speaking Switzerland.
- Partner with product, credit, and wealth planning teams.
- Maintain top KYC/AML and suitability standards.
- Build referral channels via lawyers, trustees, and entrepreneurs.

## Core Requirements
- 7–10+ years Swiss onshore PB; portable German-speaking network.
- Fluency in German and English; French a plus.
- Swiss permit/residency strongly preferred.

## Essential Competencies
Client acquisition drive, meticulous compliance, cultural fluency, collaborative mindset, entrepreneurial approach.

## What Our Client Offers
Leading Swiss platform, competitive grid, comprehensive product shelf, strong brand.
